all-packages.description: The nanosome-util project contains core ActionScript 3 util to improve the quality or performance of applications or frameworks. We limit it to the utils necessary to develop our nanosome projects. This covers fast dispatching, disposing, anonymous object access and alike.

package.name: nanosome.util
package.shortDescription: Contains general utils used by various nanosome projects.
package.description: General util for working with flash: language structures, core interfaces, etc.

package.name: nanosome.access
package.shortDescription: Contains functionality for reading/writing annonymous objects.
package.description: Many parts of nanosome deal with annonymous objects. When dealing with annonymous objects there are many small traps that can be easily forgot. Beside that writing it seperatly in all cases makes it easy to have inconsitant behaviours and in some cases its even slower to implement it directly.

package.name: nanosome.util.list
package.shortDescription: Contains fast link lists used for notifications of listeners or similar use cases.
package.description: When working with listeners its not a good idea to try to implement the lists to store and access lists for each case again since it has plenty of cases that are neighter easy to implement nor easy to debug. The implementations in this package should allow fast, easy to use well tested lists.

package.name: nanosome.util.normalize
package.shortDescription: Package for algorithms to work with normalized numbers.
package.description: It is reasonable to store and work internally with normalized numbers when working with ranged values. This package offers a set of algorithms to deal with them in a standard way, providing essential functionalities for other nanosome projects.

package.name: nanosome.pool
package.shortDescription: Contains utils to work with instance pools.
package.description: Instance pools are easily implemented as lists. This package offers functionality to reduce the amount of code when working with instance pools.
